casebody.data:
MARGARET E. FAULKNER v. JOHN A. D. FAULKNER [No. 10,

January Term, 1939.]

Decided February 2nd, 1939.

*693The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Offutt, Parke, Sloan, Mitchell, Shehan, Johnson, and Delaplaine, JJ.

Edward E. Hargest, Jr., and 0. Bowie Duckett, Jr., for the appellant. Malcolm J. Coan, with whom was Howard C. Bregel on the brief, for the appellee. Sloan, J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court.
